text: Author : Zach Johnson / Source : E! Online Harry Styles began with a bang. The 23 - year - old singer - songwriter kicked off his weeklong residency on CBS ’ The Late Late Show Monday, joining The Wall ‘ s Aaron Taylor - Johnson on James Corden ‘ s couch.
